# Test that deep fuzzy complete does not work.

cp main.go.orig main.go
vim ex 'e main.go'
errlogmatch -wait 30s 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go
vim ex 'call cursor(11,1)'
vim ex 'execute \"normal A\\<C-X>\\<C-O>\"'
vim ex 'w'
cmp main.go main.go.orig
# Disabled pending resolution to https://github.com/golang/go/issues/34103
# errlogmatch -count=0 'LogMessage callback: &protocol\.LogMessageParams\{Type:(1|2), Message:".*'

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- main.go.orig --
package main

func main() {
	var a struct {
		b struct {
			crikey int
		}
		d int
	}
	var x int
	x = a.ck
}
